Help

On this page, you have an overview with all your past purchases. Click on the button to get more information about a purchase, the buyer and the ordered article.

The Status column indicates the current position of a sale in the ordering process. You can mark the sales as paid / unpaid and the shipping as open / in progress / dispatched. Your customer will be informed about every change.
